name: L-arginine,reduced-flavodoxin:oxygen oxidoreductase (nitric-oxide-forming)
definition: 2 L-Arginine + 3 Reduced flavodoxin + 4 Oxygen <=> 2 L-Citrulline + 2 Nitric oxide + 3 Oxidized flavodoxin + 4 H2O
